title: Design, synthesis and cytotoxic activity of molecular hybrids based on quinolin-8-yloxy and cinnamide hybrids and their apoptosis inducing property
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11443-11451
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01911C, Paper

Dalal Nasser Binjawhar, Fawziah A. Al-Salmi, Ola A. Abu Ali, Maha Ali Alghamdi, Eman Fayad, Rasha Mohammed Saleem, Islam Zaki, N. A. Farouk
A sequence of novel quinoline-8-yloxy and cinnamide hybrids has been synthesized and evaluated for in vitro cytotoxicity against HepG2 liver cancer cells.
